attributes.action: The Rt Hon Edward Davey MP, The Rt Hon Gregory Barker MP, & The Rt Hon Michael Fallon MP
attributes.additional_details:
Above named to resign, due to failure to deliver any reasonable policies, resulting in driving population of UK into powerty, while endless profiteering of Energy suppliers is not only allowed, supprted, but directly encouraged.

The whle governemtn shall realize what the function and position is and should be - to be servants of public responsible to those supporting and electing them to act on our behlf and in our interest, this is not business, energy companies do run business - lets thoughen the rulles preventing profiteering on our expense!
